thread.title: Kate S.
thread.title_full: Vacation Rental Pros reviewed by Kate S.

author: Kate S.
title: Kate S.
text: We have rented different properties in St. Augustine through Vacation Rental Pros for the last five years. Their personnel have always been very helpful and friendly, and the properties as advertised. Last year, we did have a problem with booking and deposits that took a while to straighten out, but I think that was caused more by an owner taking a property off the market after booking, rather than by Vacation Rental Pros.
